draw.shapes

Class ShapeUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • draw.shapes.ShapeUtil

  • public class ShapeUtil
extends Object
    Class with useful utility functions for dealing with shapes. Contains a set of static methods.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    hp

      Modifier and Type Field and Description

      Tolerance value for selections

    • Method Detail

      • areClose

        public static boolean areClose(double v1,
               double v2)
        Determines of two provided values are close (within TOL).
        Parameters:
        v1 - the first value
        v2 - the second value
        Returns:
        true if first and second value differ less than TOL

      • isWithin

        public static boolean isWithin(double v,
               double min,
               double max)
        Tests if value v is within min and max.
        Parameters:
        v - the value to test
        min - the mimimum value
        max - the maximum value
        Returns:
        true if value is within min and max

      • getLeft

        public static int getLeft(Shape[] shapes)
        Gets the leftmost coordinate of the given shapes.
        Parameters:
        shapes - the array of shapes
        Returns:
        the leftmost coordinate of all the shapes

      • getTop

        public static int getTop(Shape[] shapes)
        Gets the topmost coordinate of the given shapes.
        Parameters:
        shapes - the array of shapes
        Returns:
        the topmost coordinate of all the shapes

      • getWidth

        public static int getWidth(Shape[] shapes)
        Gets the with of a set of shapes. It is computed by the difference of the leftmost coordinate and the rightmost coordinate of the given shapes.
        Parameters:
        shapes - the array of shapes
        Returns:
        the with of all the shapes

      • getHeight

        public static int getHeight(Shape[] shapes)
        Gets the height of a set of shapes. It is computed by the difference of the topmost coordinate and the bottom-most coordinate of the given shapes.
        Parameters:
        shapes - the array of shapes
        Returns:
        the height of all the shapes

      • copyShapes

        public static Shape[] copyShapes(Shape[] shapes)
        Copies all shapes in an array of shapes.
        Parameters:
        shapes - the shapes to copy.
        Returns:
        an array containing the copied shapes.

      • getSelected

        public static Shape[] getSelected(Shape[] shapes,
                  int left,
                  int top,
                  int right,
                  int bottom)
        Finds the shapes from an set of shapes which are fully contained within the given coordinates.
        Parameters:
        shapes - the shapes to test for containment
        left - the left coordinate
        top - the top coordinate
        right - the right coordinate
        bottom - the bottom coordinate
        Returns:
        the shapes which are fully contained within the given coordinates

      • isWithin

        private static boolean isWithin(Shape s,
               int left,
               int top,
               int right,
               int bottom)
        Tests if the given shape is fully contained within the given coordinates.
        Parameters:
        s - the shape to test
        left - the left coordinate
        top - the top coordinate
        right - the right coordinate
        bottom - the bottom coordinate
        Returns:
        true if shape is fully contained within the given coordinates
